description:
**YOU WILL GET ACCESS TO ALL PROJECT FILES CREATED DURING THIS COURSE**

Learn by doing!

iOS - professional mobile developer is the continuation of our basic course. During this training you will create 3 advanced applications, that you can extend according your ideas!

1. Task Manager

You will programm from scratch the application to manage your tasks. Our trainer will show you step-by-step, how change it to usefull shopping list app.

2. Picasa Galery

This application will show you how to manage images in cloud, how to use filters to change pics. You will create with ease user interface in Storyboard!

3. Stargate Battle

The last application, that you will create using Cocos 2d framework is Stargate Battle. Trainer will demonstrate, how you can use it to create a proffesional game working on iPhones and iPads. You will learn how to build and add spaceship, how to shoot to enemies, how you can change game levels.

Gain higher level of programming

Don't waste your time, become proffesional mobile developer and create advanced applications, that will succeed in AppStore!

Start your training today with Educativo!
title: iOS - become a professional mobile developer
